mapper.insert: insert into t_car_owner (car_plate_no,customer_name,id_card,vehicle_id_no,engine_no,brand_modal,brand_modal_ch,register_date,is_secondhand,transfor_date) values ( #{carPlateNo}, default, #{customerName}, default, #{idCard}, default, #{vehicleIdNo}, default, #{engineNo}, default, #{brandModal}, default, #{brandModalCh}, default, #{registerDate}, default, #{isSecondhand}, default, #{transforDate}, default, )
mapper.select:
select car_plate_no,customer_name,id_card,vehicle_id_no,engine_no,brand_modal,brand_modal_ch,register_date,is_secondhand,transfor_date from t_car_owner
